job_details.Vacaturetitel: Sr. Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer - GenAI & LLM
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
The Machine Learning (ML) Practice team is a highly specialized customer-facing ML team at Databricks facing an increasing demand for Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions. We deliver professional services engagements to help our customers build, scale, and optimize ML pipelines, as well as put those pipelines into production. We work cross-functionally to shape long-term strategic priorities and initiatives alongside engineering, product, and developer relations, as well as support internal subject matter expert (SME) teams. We view our team as an ensemble: we look for individuals with strong, unique specializations to improve the overall strength of the team. This team is the right fit for you if you love working with customers, teammates, and fueling your curiosity for the latest trends in LLMs, MLOps, and ML more broadly. This role can be remote.

   The impact you will have:
     * Develop LLM solutions on customer data such as RAG architectures on enterprise knowledge repos, querying structured data with natural language, and content generation
     * Build, scale, and optimize customer data science workloads and apply best in class MLOps to productionize these workloads across a variety of domains
     * Advise data teams on various data science such as architecture, tooling, and best practices
     * Present at conferences such as Data+AI Summit
     * Provide technical mentorship to the larger ML SME community in Databricks
     * Collaborate cross-functionally with the product and engineering teams to define priorities and influence the product roadmap
job_details.full_text:
Sr. Data Scientist / Machine Learning Engineer - GenAI & LLM

The Machine Learning (ML) Practice team is a highly specialized customer-facing ML team at Databricks facing an increasing demand for Large Language Model (LLM)-based solutions. We deliver professional services engagements to help our customers build, scale, and optimize ML pipelines, as well as put those pipelines into production. We work cross-functionally to shape long-term strategic priorities and initiatives alongside engineering, product, and developer relations, as well as support internal subject matter expert (SME) teams. We view our team as an ensemble: we look for individuals with strong, unique specializations to improve the overall strength of the team. This team is the right fit for you if you love working with customers, teammates, and fueling your curiosity for the latest trends in LLMs, MLOps, and ML more broadly. This role can be remote.

   The impact you will have:
     * Develop LLM solutions on customer data such as RAG architectures on enterprise knowledge repos, querying structured data with natural language, and content generation
     * Build, scale, and optimize customer data science workloads and apply best in class MLOps to productionize these workloads across a variety of domains
     * Advise data teams on various data science such as architecture, tooling, and best practices
     * Present at conferences such as Data+AI Summit
     * Provide technical mentorship to the larger ML SME community in Databricks
     * Collaborate cross-functionally with the product and engineering teams to define priorities and influence the product roadmap

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing LLM-based solutions, including RAG architectures and querying structured data with natural language. It also highlights building, scaling, and optimizing ML pipelines with MLOps, and productionizing workloads, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop LLM solutions on customer data such as RAG architectures on enterprise knowledge repos, querying structured data with natural language, and content generation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development and adaptation of generative models (LLMs) for specific tasks like RAG, natural language querying, and content generation.

job_tasks.phrase: Build, scale, and optimize customer data science workloads and apply best in class MLOps to productionize these workloads
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates the need to manage and maintain ML/GenAI models in production environments, which is the core of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: productionize these workloads across a variety of domains
job_tasks.justification: Productionizing workloads implies building and integrating the developed models into functional systems or applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: We deliver professional services engagements to help our customers build, scale, and optimize ML pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand customer needs and translate them into technical solutions within a professional services context.

job_tasks.phrase: We work cross-functionally to shape long-term strategic priorities and initiatives alongside engineering, product, and developer relations
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to collaborate with various teams (engineering, product) to define strategies and priorities.

job_tasks.phrase: fueling your curiosity for the latest trends in LLMs, MLOps, and ML more broadly
job_tasks.justification: This implies a need to stay updated and apply new knowledge to solve problems in a rapidly evolving field.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide technical mentorship to the larger ML SME community in Databricks
job_tasks.justification: Mentorship requires strong communication and the ability to share knowledge effectively with others.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate cross-functionally with the product and engineering teams to define priorities and influence the product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states collaboration with product and engineering teams to influence strategic direction.
While broad, 'data science workloads' often encompass the data pipelines and infrastructure needed to support ML models.

job_tasks.phrase: Advise data teams on various data science such as architecture, tooling, and best practices
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the business context and providing expert advice on technical solutions and strategies.

soft_skills.phrase: We work cross-functionally to shape long-term strategic priorities and initiatives alongside engineering, product, and developer relations
fueling your curiosity for the latest trends in LLMs, MLOps, and ML more broadly
Provide technical mentorship to the larger ML SME community in Databricks
Collaborate cross-functionally with the product and engineering teams to define priorities and influence the product roadmap
Advise data teams on various data science such as architecture, tooling, and best practices
